Messages.Author: Florian Jan Rzepka
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Please select your preferred exam date from the following options: 01.08.24 09.10.24 Sign up for one of these dates by July 5th. If possible, we encourage you to choose August 1st, as a larger room is available on that date. Thank you. Best regards, Florian

Messages.Author: Florian Jan Rzepka
Messages.Content: Dear Students,  Just a reminder that the choice of exam date is still open until July 5th. Please ensure that everyone who has not yet signed up does so by that date. Students who have not registered by then will be assigned a date. After July 5th, I will publish a list indicating which students are assigned to each exam date.  Thank you for your cooperation.  Best regards,  Florian

Messages.Author: Florian Jan Rzepka
Messages.Content: Hi, To everyone who still needs to register for the exam: the exam registration has been extended until July 5th. Please register through MOSES. Please let me know if anything doesn't work out. Best regards, Florian Rzepka

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Course Evaluation for Energy Storage Technologies

Messages.Author: Florian Jan Rzepka
Messages.Content: Dear students, Please take a few minutes to participate in the course evaluation for "Energy Storage Technologies (Vorlesung/ Übung)." Your feedback is valuable and will help improve the course. Survey Link:  https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?pswd=Y4CRC. Survey Period: June 17, 2024 - June 28, 2024 Thank you for your participation! Best regards, Florian

Messages.Author: Florian Jan Rzepka
Messages.Content: Here are the dates for the presentations:  you can also see your date in the "Lecture and Tutorial Schedule" on the front page  01.07.2024: Group S9: Power supply for an arctic research facility Group S12: Seasonal Storage for large Scale PV-System 02.07.2024: Group S1: Energy storage for a wind park in isolated operation mode Group M1: Onboard power supply in vehicles 15.07.2024: Group S10: PV-System energy storage for self supply Group S16: Hybrid Storage Systems for Smart Homes Group S8: Power supply and storage for a research facility and habitat on the Moon 16.07.2024: Group S13: Uninterruptable power supply for a hospital in a developing nation Group M5: Power supply for transport aircraft Group S3: Energy storage for frequency stabilization

Messages.Author: Julia Kowal
Messages.Content: Dear all,  We have a small change: Group M5 is also presenting on July 15 and therefore, on this day, we start at 12:00 (not at 12:15 as usual).  Best regards, Julia Kowal

Messages.Author: Julia Kowal
Messages.Content: Wir möchten auf folgende Nachricht aus dem Mentoring der Fakultät IV hinweisen:   Hallo!   Ab sofort kannst du dich wieder als Mentor*in anmelden und wir freuen uns, wenn du dieses Jahr (wieder) dabei bist. Mentoring ist mehr als nur ein Modul, denn als Mentor*in profitierst du mindestens genauso davon wie hinterher die Erstis von dir. Auch in diesem Jahr haben wir Events für Mentor*innen geplant mit vielen Gelegenheiten, die Uni aus einer anderen Perspektive, mit neuen Möglichkeiten kennen zu lernen. Außerdem bieten wir dir zusätzlich: 3 LP Vorbereitungsschulungen, Feedbacktreffen und individuelle Begleitung Lerninhalte wie z.B. Gruppenleitung, Kommunikation, Motivation, Awareness u.v.m. Mentor*innenevents mit hohem Spaßfaktor   Achso, du weißt noch gar nicht was deine Aufgabe als Mentor*in ist? Du begleitest im Team eine Gruppe von Erstis bei ihrem Start ins Studium. Wie genau das gedacht ist kannst du auf unserer Website erfahren oder auch in einem unserer kommenden Q&A Treffen. Komm vorbei und stelle deine Fragen.   Termine: Q&A Mentoring Meeting (online) Wann? 14. Juni 15:00-16:00 Uhr Wo? Zoom: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/68007662297?pwd=s389c9ibzKQKHUKeEUzbzsNL3lweqb.1    Mentoring Warm-up mit ehemaligen Mentor*innen Wann? 5. Juli ab 17 Uhr Wo? Kulturfabrik Moabit   Q&A Mentoring (online) Wann? 22. August 15:00-16:00 Uhr Wo? Zoom: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/68007662297?pwd=s389c9ibzKQKHUKeEUzbzsNL3lweqb.1    Natürlich kannst du uns auch jederzeit eine Mail schreiben (mentoring@eecs.tu-berlin.de), anrufen (+49 30 314 -73194) oder vorbeikommen (MAR 6.006).   Wir freuen uns auf jeden Fall, wenn du dieses Jahr Teil des Mentorings bist.   Viele Grüße   Luis & Maria     Links: Website: https://mentoring.eecs.tu-berlin.de/werde-mentor-in/ ISIS-Kurs mit Anmeldung: https://isis.tu-berlin.de/course/view.php?id=39260

Messages.Author: Julia Kowal
Messages.Content: Dear all, Tomorrow at 4 pm, Stadler is introduced and you can also ask about open positions or other possibilities to join them. On July 16, there will be a presentation by IAV, also 4 pm in EMH 225. Best regards, Julia Kowal

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Announcement: Presentation Date Selection is Now Open!

Messages.Author: Florian Jan Rzepka
Messages.Content: Hey everyone,  The date selection for the presentations is now open! Selection Closes: Tuesday, June 11, 2024 Make sure to pick your date before the deadline. If you have any questions, just let us know.  Florian

Messages.Author: Julia Kowal
Messages.Content: Dear all, I re-opened the registration in MOSES until this friday. Everybody who forgot to register, please register now. Best regards, Julia Kowal

Messages.Author: Florian Jan Rzepka
Messages.Content: Brief reminder of the group selection  Groups for the seminar topics Open: Monday, 20.05.2024, 10:00 Close: Sunnday, 26.05.2024, 23:55

Messages.Author: Florian Jan Rzepka
Messages.Content: Some groups were not visible at the selection. The problem is now solved. You should now be able to select all groups as long as they are not full.

Messages.Author: Florian Jan Rzepka
Messages.Content: The tutorial on 07.05 will take place as planned. You can still find an overview of when tutorials and lectures are swapped on the main page of the isis course.   Best regards, Florian

Messages.Author: Julia Kowal
Messages.Content: Dear all, Tomorrow at 4 pm (after the exercise), TESVOLT is introduced and you can also ask about open positions or other possibilities to join them. Best regards, Julia Kowal

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Campus sanieren statt zu Hause studieren

Messages.Author: Julia Kowal
Messages.Content: Hallo zusammen, Am Dienstag gibt es eine Veranstaltung, auf die ich hinweisen möchte: Es geht um den Zustand der TU-Gebäude. Ort: Straße des 17. Juni vor dem Mathegebäude Zeit: 30.04.2024 11:00-13:00 Uhr Thema: Campus sanieren statt zu Hause studieren  Viele Grüße, Julia Kowal

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Anyone interested in joining S10: PV-Storage?

Messages.Author: Thomas Arthur Fox
Messages.Content: Hi all,  I noticed that the Topic "S10: PV-System energy storage for self supply" has freed up. I'm reluctant to join an empty group, so I wanted to ask beforehand if anyone else would be interested in doing this topic with me? Let me know and if we find enough people we can join the group together.

Messages.Author: Marieke Osewold
Messages.Content: Hi Thomas, I am more interested in the topic "M3: Emergency power supply in disaster areas". But if no group is formed by Sunday, I can imagine switching to your suggested topic :)

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Searching for team members for topic M3

Messages.Author: Marieke Osewold
Messages.Content: Hi! Since my team members decided to move to another topic, I am now alone with topic M3: Emergency power supply in disaster areas. I still find this topic very interesting, is anyone interested in working on it together?

Messages.Author: Christian Reinhardt
Messages.Content: Hi, I was wondering, would it be possible that the tutorials could be recorded like the lecture? I've got another lecture during the slot on Tuesday, so it would be quite helpful to watch the tutorials recordings instead of just working on them by myself. Thank you for your help. Kind regards, Christian Reinhardt

Messages.Author: Devin Amadeus
Messages.Content: Hi, I am an automotive systems master student and I am looking for another compulsory elective module for 3 ECTS. On Moses it says that this has 2 SWS. But after seeing the schedule on ISIS it seems to have more than that. Does it mean that this course actually counts 6 ECTS? This semester I am also doing the Seminar SFE. What would be a good suggestion? Is it better to just continue the SFE next semester and get another 3 ECTS there? Thank you for your attention and I would love to hear back from you. Best regards, Devin Amadeus

Messages.Author: Julia Kowal
Messages.Content: Hi,  If you can come to the lecture today, I will explain the different possibilities.  Best regards, Julia Kowal
